DerivedAttribute.name: deliveryState

DerivedAttribute.name: fieldState
DerivedAttribute.value: CASE WHEN #compareAsDate('Product2.Field_Valid_From__c', 'Date','le',#TodayAsDate#, 'Date')# AND #compareAsDate('Product2.Field_Valid_Thru__c', 'Date','ge',#TodayAsDate#, 'Date')# THEN 'Available' ELSE 'NotAvailable' END

DerivedAttribute.name: newState
DerivedAttribute.value: CASE WHEN #compareAsDate('Product2.New_Item_Valid_From__c', 'Date','le',#TodayAsDate#, 'Date')# AND #compareAsDate('Product2.New_Item_Valid_Thru__c', 'Date','ge',#TodayAsDate#, 'Date')# THEN 'Available' ELSE 'NotAvailable' END
